channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: US appeals court says Trump can take command of Oregon troops though deployment blocked for now
item.description: A U.S. appeals court has ruled that President Donald Trump can take command of 200 Oregon National Guard troops.

item.title: ICE would need more money to expand use of bodycams in Chicago crackdown, official says
What to know about the recovery efforts in Alaska following ex-Typhoon Halong
